summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Cabaña Los Capayanes website including backend API, frontend form, gallery, and WhatsApp integration. All major functionalities are working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Form not clearing after successful submission in some test cases
design_issues.note: Form clears after 3-second timeout per code logic, but might be inconsistent in testing

passed_tests: Backend API health check - all endpoints responding
Contact form POST /api/contact/ - successful creation with valid data
Contact form validation - proper error handling for invalid data
Contact form GET /api/contact/ - retrieving all contacts
All service types (cabaña, camping, ambos, actividades) working
Frontend contact form submission with validation
WhatsApp button with correct phone number (+5493834050043)
All images loading properly from customer-assets.emergentagent.com
Phone number consistency across all sections (31 references found)
End-to-end integration: frontend → backend → MongoDB workflow
